SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT m2.id FROM sys_menu m2 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m2.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m2.deleted = 0 AND m2.status = 0
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT m3.id FROM sys_menu m3 WHERE m3.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT m2.parent_id FROM sys_menu m2 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m2.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m2.deleted = 0 AND m2.status = 0 ) AND m3.deleted = 0 AND m3.status = 0 ) ORDER BY m.sort
